verbose_text: Sitagliptin is a dipeptidyl peptidase-4 inhibitor that is used to treat diabetes [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], especially patients with type 2 diabetes and reduced incretin activity [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
